text: Boyelles is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A farming village located 6 miles (11 km) south of Arras on the N17 road. A celebration of the potato takes place annually on the 1st Sunday in September. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Leger, dating from the twentieth century. * The Commonwealth War Graves Commission cemetery. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file ==External links== * The CWGC cemetery Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Boyelles
